# Triposia - Global Flight Information Platform

## About
Triposia is a comprehensive global flight information platform providing authoritative, factual data about airports, flight routes, airlines, departures, and arrivals worldwide. The platform is optimized for both traditional search engines and AI-powered answer systems (ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity, Copilot).

## Site Information
- Website: https://triposia.com
- Purpose: Flight information, airport data, airline routes, and travel intelligence
- Content Type: Entity-driven, factual aviation data
- Update Frequency: Daily updates for flight schedules, weekly for airline data

## URL Structure

### Airports
- Pattern: `/airports/[iata]` (e.g., `/airports/DEL`, `/airports/JFK`)
- Departures: `/airports/[iata]/departures` (e.g., `/airports/DEL/departures`)
- Arrivals: `/airports/[iata]/arrivals` (e.g., `/airports/DEL/arrivals`)
- Country airports: `/airports/country/[country-code]`

### Flight Routes
- Route pages: `/flights/[route]` (e.g., `/flights/del-bom`, `/flights/jfk-lhr`)
- Flights from airport: `/flights/from-[iata]` (e.g., `/flights/from-DEL`)
- Flights to airport: `/flights/to-[iata]` (e.g., `/flights/to-JFK`)
- Country routes: `/flights/country/[country-code]`

### Airlines
- Airline pages: `/airlines/[code]` (e.g., `/airlines/AA`, `/airlines/DL`)
- Airline routes: `/airlines/[code]/routes`
- Airline from airport: `/airlines/[code]/from-[iata]`
- Airline specific route: `/airlines/[code]/[route]` (e.g., `/airlines/AA/jfk-lax`)

### Blog & Content
- Blog listing: `/blog`
- Blog post: `/blog/[slug]`
- Blog by author: `/blog/author/[author-slug]`
- Blog by category: `/blog/category/[category-slug]`

### Static Pages
- Homepage: `/`
- About: `/team`
- Editorial Policy: `/editorial-policy`
- How We Help: `/how-we-help`
- Manifesto: `/manifesto`
- Corrections: `/corrections`

## Data Entities

### Airports
Each airport page contains:
- IATA code (3-letter airport identifier)
- Airport name and location
- City and country
- Departure and arrival statistics
- Destination count
- Flight schedules
- Geographic coordinates

### Flight Routes
Each route page contains:
- Origin and destination airports (IATA codes)
- Route name (e.g., "Delhi to Mumbai")
- Flight frequency (flights per day/week)
- Operating airlines
- Aircraft types used
- Flight duration
- Price trends (when available)
- Monthly flight data

### Airlines
Each airline page contains:
- Airline code (IATA/ICAO)
- Airline name
- Country of origin
- Route network
- Destinations served
- Flight schedules
- Aircraft fleet information

### Flights
Individual flight data includes:
- Flight number
- Airline information
- Origin and destination
- Departure and arrival times
- Aircraft type
- Schedule frequency

- Main sitemap: https://triposia.com/sitemap.xml
- Static pages: https://triposia.com/sitemap-static.xml
- Airports: https://triposia.com/sitemap-airports.xml
- Airlines: https://triposia.com/sitemap-airlines.xml
- Blogs: https://triposia.com/sitemap-blogs.xml
- Flights (5 parts): 
  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-flights-1.xml
  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-flights-2.xml
  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-flights-3.xml
  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-flights-4.xml
  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-flights-5.xml

  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-airline-routes-2.xml

  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-airline-routes-4.xml
  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-airline-routes-5.xml
- Airline airports (5 parts):
  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-airline-airports-1.xml
  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-airline-airports-2.xml
  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-airline-airports-3.xml
  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-airline-airports-4.xml
  - https://triposia.com/sitemap-airline-airports-5.xml

## Structured Data
All pages include JSON-LD structured data for:
- Organization schema
- Airport schema (Airport entity)
- Flight route schema
- Airline schema
- Breadcrumb navigation
- Article schema (for blog posts)

## Content Characteristics
- Factual, data-driven content
- Regular updates (daily for flights, weekly for airlines)
- Comprehensive coverage of global aviation
- Entity-focused information architecture
- Optimized for AI answer engines
- Semantic HTML structure

## Key Features
- Real-time flight schedules
- Airport departure/arrival boards
- Route frequency analysis
- Airline network maps
- Flight duration information
- Aircraft type data
- Geographic coverage: Global (6 continents)

## Data Sources
- MongoDB Atlas database
- Regularly updated flight schedules
- Airport and airline databases
- Route frequency calculations
- Flight metadata

## Contact
- Email: info@triposia.com
- Address: 1401 21st Street Suite R, Sacramento, CA 95811

## Social Media
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/airlinesmap/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/triposia_official/
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@triposia
- Dailymotion: https://www.dailymotion.com/triposia.com

## Technical Details
- Framework: Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Rendering: Hybrid (ISR + SSR)
- Database: MongoDB Atlas
- Hosting: Vercel
- Language: TypeScript

## Best Practices for AI Crawlers
- All content is publicly accessible (except /admin/ and /api/ paths)
- Structured data is embedded in all pages
- Canonical URLs are properly set
- Content is optimized for entity extraction
- Pages are mobile-responsive
- Fast loading times with ISR caching
